description:
This class will take you step-by-step from your initial design to a finished Joomla template.

Creating a fantastic look and feel for your Joomla site is pretty important. You can buy templates, or even download and use free ones! But if you really want a unique look - you have to create one that really highlights your site's content.

We hope you enjoy the course!
title: Joomla 2.5 Template Design
